New Records: Muhammad Rizwan scored the slowest fifty for Pakistan in T20 internationals
Key Match Events: Pakistan reach 107-3 with 15 balls to spare
Muhammad Rizwan comes on strike and gets three with a miss-field to pass the fifty landmark
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan captain Babar Azam: 'We needed this win.'
Canada captain Saad Bin Zafar: 'It was a bit disappointing.'
Post-Match Reflections: Player of the match Mohammad Amir: 'As a bowler you have to adapt to conditions.'
Player of the match Mohammad Amir: 'That was a much-needed win to be honest.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan have chalked up their first win to just about keep their qualifying flame alive.
Canada slip below their opponents to fourth - like Pakistan they have two points, but now have a negative run-rate so their chances of qualification are even slimmer.
Others: Pakistan seal crucial win over Canada in T20 World Cup
Pakistan at last have registered their first win. They will have helped their net run rate finishing with 15 balls to spare.
